about_the_game:
Dino Dash is an exciting adventure where you’ll test your speed and reflexes while collecting dinosaur eggs! As you gather eggs, the challenges increase and the danger behind you gets closer. With every level, your speed will increase, and the obstacles will become more difficult. The threats chasing you will get faster and more aggressive, making it even harder to survive.

While collecting eggs, you’ll need to think strategically and plan your moves carefully. Quick reflexes and perfect timing are key to staying alive in this dangerous world. The more eggs you collect, the higher your score will be, but each wrong move brings you closer to the dangers that are hot on your heels.

Dino Dash offers a challenging yet enjoyable experience with increasing difficulty levels in each stage. Your goal is to survive while collecting as many eggs as possible and achieving the highest score. Test yourself, improve your strategy, and try to stay alive in this thrilling dino world!

name: Dino Dash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

short_description: We get caught collecting a dinosaur's eggs and it's trying not to get caught.
